pages.text: When $(aura) levels get low enough in any area of any world, the increasing pressure of the environment makes it harder to contain oneself. Certain monsters, like $(item)Zombified Piglins$(), $(item)Endermen$() and other creatures that would usually only feel bothered when disturbed will instead start to $(thing)get angry$() seemingly completely out of the blue as soon as one comes close enough to them.
